headers.header_text: ENGL 390 section 002: Transnational Discipline of Women's Studies

catalog.description: Period-specific courses using transnational models for literary analysis. Read selected texts in a transatlantic context and in the light of applicable theoretical approaches. Identify and locate appropriate research sources for the study of transatlantic literatures. Incorporate these sources into a research paper and other possible assignments. Produce polished writing free from distracting errors and in accordance with MLA formatting and citation guidelines.
catalog.prerequisite: Engl 251, Engl 295, Engl 291; and either Engl 292 & 293 or Engl 294.
catalog.title: Transnational/Transatlantic Literature from 1900-Present.
